Sentencas: Cobaltite based perovskites, such as Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-delta(SSC), are attractive solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) cathodes due to their high electrochemical activity and electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Synthesis and applications of composite cathode based on Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-δ for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: To obtain higher fuel cell, performance with smaller particles, nano-sized SSC powders were synthesized by a complex method with/without carbon black, HB170.
Titulo: Synthesis and applications of composite cathode based on Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-δ for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: However, during synthesis, carbon black reacted with Sr, and unfortunately formed SrCO3.
Titulo: Synthesis and applications of composite cathode based on Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-δ for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: To obtain pure perovskite SSC, a calcination temperature of 900 degrees C is needed.
Titulo: Synthesis and applications of composite cathode based on Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-δ for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: At 680 degrees C, an SOFC with SSC (calcined at 700 degrees C and synthesized without HB170) exhibited a higher fuel cell performance, of 0.68 W.cm(-2), than that with SSCHB (calcined at 900 degrees C and synthesized with HB170), of 0.58 W.cm(-2).
Titulo: Synthesis and applications of composite cathode based on Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-δ for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Adding GDC for composite cathode is more effective in SSCHB porous cathodes than in SSC porous cathodes.
Titulo: Synthesis and applications of composite cathode based on Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-δ for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: At 680 degrees C, the composite cathode of SSCHB6-GDC4 exhibited the highest maximum power density of 0.72 W.cm(-2) which results from the combined effects of lowered charge transfer polarization and mass transfer polarization.
Titulo: Synthesis and applications of composite cathode based on Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-δ for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: To obtain higher fuel cell performance, optimum composition and processes are necessary.
Titulo: Synthesis and applications of composite cathode based on Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-δ for solid oxide fuel cell
